useCase.name: User Registration
useCase.description: User requests registration, fills in the registration form, accepts consent, and receives a success message.

preconditions.precondition: User is on the registration page.

successEndConditions.condition: User successfully completes the registration process.

mainSequence.step: FrontEnd shows registration form to User.
User fills in the registration form.
FrontEnd shows Consent form to User.
FrontEnd shows success message to User.
